LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Catalog.Products.BundleItems.AdminNotePerItemPricing

Included or taken into account during calculation of the price of bundle items are:
Special price, price adjustment of attributes, per bundle item specified discounts and quantities.

Not included and taken into account are:
Tier prices, customer enters price, call for price, weight adjustment of attributes, all other discounts.

The display of basic prices can be controlled by an option (see catalog settings).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.General
LocaleResource.Value: A CAPTCHA is a program that can tell whether its user is a human or a computer. You've probably seen them — colorful images with distorted text at the bottom of Web registration forms. CAPTCHAs are used by many websites to prevent abuse from "bots," or automated programs usually written to generate spam. No computer program can read distorted text as well as humans can, so bots cannot navigate sites protected by CAPTCHAs. SmartStore.NET uses reCAPTCHA.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Theme.GoogleFonts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value:
To embed Google Fonts please not the following advices.

  • Go to https://fonts.google.com/ and choose the font-families you want to use in your store.
  • The Html code that will be provided to you to embed the choosen fonts into your website looks like this: 
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:100,300,400,500,700|Ubuntu" rel="stylesheet">
  • Copy the bold marked part of the link and enter it into one of the threee fields within the theme configurator that's intended for this purpose.
  • Now you can use the fonts by entering the name of a font-family (e.g. Roboto) into one of the input fields which are provided to configure font-families (e.g. $font-family-sans-serif).
